visual_tags: Hair: Spiky blonde hair, always shiny
Outfit: Polished silver chest plate over a red tunic
Accessory: A ridiculously long red cape that he constantly trips over
Weapon: An oversized broadsword he struggles to unsheathe

description.physical: Tall, broad-shouldered, classic 'hero' jawline. Blonde hair styled perfectly.
description.personality: Over-enthusiastic, dim-witted but golden-hearted. Treats every minor inconvenience like an epic quest.

gemini.prompt:
Create a CHARACTER TURNAROUND SHEET in webtoon art style.

## LAYOUT
Create a SINGLE IMAGE showing the SAME character THREE times side by side:
- LEFT: Full body FRONT view (facing viewer)
- CENTER: Full body SIDE view (profile, facing right)
- RIGHT: Full body BACK view (facing away)

## REQUIREMENTS
- All three views show the EXACT SAME character with IDENTICAL outfit
- Full body from head to feet in each view
- Relaxed standing pose (arms slightly away from body to show costume)
- Clean white or light gray background
- Character sheet/model sheet style for animation reference
- All views at the same scale and aligned at feet level
- Show clothing, hair, and accessories clearly from all angles
- Professional quality suitable for production reference

## CONSISTENCY IS CRITICAL
- Same hair style/color in all views
- Same outfit in all views (every detail must match)
- Same accessories and items in all views
- Same body proportions in all views


Character: Marcus
Age: 21
Physical appearance: Tall, broad-shouldered, classic 'hero' jawline. Blonde hair styled perfectly.
Visual details: Hair: Spiky blonde hair, always shiny, Outfit: Polished silver chest plate over a red tunic, Accessory: A ridiculously long red cape that he constantly trips over, Weapon: An oversized broadsword he struggles to unsheathe, Build: Muscular but stiff posture
Personality (for expression): Over-enthusiastic, dim-witted but golden-hearted. Treats every minor inconvenience like an epic quest.
